name: SubnetGroup
description: Creates a cache subnet group. For more information about cache subnet groups, go to Cache Subnet Groups in the Amazon ElastiCache User Guide or go to CreateCacheSubnetGroup in the Amazon ElastiCache API Reference Guide.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description for the cache subnet group.

properties.name: SubnetIds
properties.description: The Amazon EC2 subnet IDs for the cache subnet group.
